Table of Contents

Name

fromyuv - convert an Abekas yuv image into an IRIS image

Synopsis

fromyuv inimage.yuv outimage.rgb [-s]

Description

fromyuv converts an digital video image in Abekas yuv format into IRIS image file format. This will normally create an image that is 720 by 486 pixels. This image will have non-square pixels. If square pixels are desired, use the [lq]-s[rq] option. This will create an IRIS image that is 640 by 486 pixels.

See Also

toyuv(6D)
